content: keep essentials secure in the style of this crochet pouch stitched in lily sugar n cream and featuring new coats & clark yarn zip the pouch is stitched from the top by working directly into the zipper in continuous rounds of single_crochet and then seamed along the bottom edge not having to sew a zipper in is a relief measuring 8 w x 5 h it s a charming gift idea with so many uses materials lily® sugar n cream® ombres 2 oz/56 7 g 95 yds/86 m playtime 02741 1 ball or 90 yds/82 m measurements approx 8 20 5 cm wide x 5 12 5 cm deep
